ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Snow Likely
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

state.message: We are Open and will be here from 7 to 10 PM tonight, Monday. We will next open on Wednesday from 12 - 5PM and Sunday from 12 - 5PM. Come on by for a visit or check us out on Facebook.
